The landlord wants a rehearing. Sun, 29 Sep 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Simon Usher and his wife have been awarded just over $18,000 in a Tenancy Tribunal decision.

Sun, 29 Sep 2024 16:00:00 +0000 GV Rupa's Cafe, 103 Wellington St, Freemans Bay, Auckland. Dilip Rupa owes $350,000 in rates to Auckland Council. Photo / NZME Main and Inset
Southern Cross claims cost soars as Kiwis cash in on health insurance https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/big-fy24-surge-in-value-and-volume-of-southern-cross-insurance-claims-as-kiwis-seek-private-health-care/ UQP5J7XBVFARVKTYISS4HXP4SY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/big-fy24-surge-in-value-and-volume-of-southern-cross-insurance-claims-as-kiwis-seek-private-health-care/ UQP5J7XBVFARVKTYISS4HXP4SY/ Andrea FoxThe cost of claims is up 15% compared to a 9% rise in premiums. Castor Bay house fire: All residents safe as firefighters tackle blaze on Auckland’s North Shore https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/castor-bay-house-fire-all-residents-safe-as-firefighters-tackle-blaze-on-aucklands-north-shore/GGREAKAKSVBCHKSBFLGHDOJMDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/castor-bay-house-fire-all-residents-safe-as-firefighters-tackle-blaze-on-aucklands-north-shore/GGREAKAKSVBCHKSBFLGHDOJMDU/ Firefighters have been working to extinguish the blaze for three hours. Sun, 29 Sep 2024 17:14:22 +0000 House fire on Beach Rd in Castor Bay, Auckland 30 September 2024. Firefighters continued to battle the blaze at dawn after calls were first made at 2.30am
Justice Minister Paul Goldsmith gave every police officer power to arrest Kim Dotcom in extradition order https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/justice-minister-paul-goldsmith-gave-every-police-officer-power-to-arrest-kim-dotcom-in-extradition-order/BW3PCKH73FD2RPO2Z5ALV33NYY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/justice-minister-paul-goldsmith-gave-every-police-officer-power-to-arrest-kim-dotcom-in-extradition-order/BW3PCKH73FD2RPO2Z5ALV33NYY/ Azaria HowellThe Megaupload founder plans to fight his extradition order. Sun, 29 Sep 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Justice Minister Paul Goldsmith authorised “every constable” in New Zealand to take Kim Dotcom into custody in the latest effort to deport him to the United States. Composite image
Rotorua grandmother Deanna Ashby’s health message after breast cancer diagnosis https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rotorua-grandmother-deanna-ashbys-health-message-after-breast-cancer-diagnosis/PQRT6UNVHBDVPAJVAJAEOUNHTQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rotorua-grandmother-deanna-ashbys-health-message-after-breast-cancer-diagnosis/PQRT6UNVHBDVPAJVAJAEOUNHTQ/ Cherie HowieBefore cancer diagnosis, she only went to the doctor for her grandkids. Sun, 29 Sep 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Deanna Ashby of Rotorua was diagnosed with breast cancer in 2018 and again in 2022. She initially put off getting worrying symptoms checked because she was busy caring for her two young grandchildren. She's since become grandmother to a third, and is pictured with all three, from left, Casius Reardon-Rippon, Calais Ashby and Kylan Black. Ashby is encouraging other women not to delay getting help if they have possible breast cancer symptoms.
